description.p: NOTE: OpenMadoola is not a standalone game and will not function without externally supplied game data. This project is not licensed or endorsed by Sunsoft.

For hundreds of years, the Lamer clan has guarded "The Wing of Madoola", a magical bird statue that grants whoever posesses it the power to rule the world. Darutos, a traitor of the Lamer clan, has stolen the statue and uses its power to summon monsters to conquer the world. It's up to Lucia, the only member of Lamer who can use magic, to defeat Darutos and recover the Wing of Madoola. You can do it, Lucia!

OpenMadoola is my attempt to make the definitive version of "The Wing of Madoola". It plays just like the original game engine, but runs natively on your computer. OpenMadoola offers many enhancements over the original version of the game, including:

ul.li: Game runs without NES hardware limitations (no slowdown, no sprite flicker, etc.)
Gameplay data is saved to disk
A recreation of the cancelled VS. System arcade port, "The Wings of Madoola"
An MML compiler that allows users to make their own music and sound effects
Numerous bugfixes and optional gameplay tweaks
Fixed Stage 15's color palette in arcade mode
Don't install 48x48 and 96x96 icons on Linux because scaling works properly and the larger icons look nicer
Added an overscan option to slightly crop video output like on an old TV
Added a color correction option for arcade mode so the colors look closer to a real arcade monitor
Fixed fullscreen behavior on GNOME
Fixed camera behavior in arcade mode to match the original arcade game
Fixed HP refill behavior in arcade mode to match the original arcade game
Fixed a bug from the original game where Lucia couldn't die when standing in front of a door
New program icons courtesy of Kak
Added a pause menu to allow users to quit the game more easily
Added the "Arcade difficulty" option
Fixed input mapping on Steam Deck desktop mode
Improve behavior when playing on a computer with multiple monitors
Change default key bindings from WASD+J/K to arrows+Z/X to make it easier for new users
Add quit menu option
Add license viewer
Add program icon
Fix save file deletion behavior on unix-like systems
